overview:
As founder and chief executive officer, Torben Majgaard has built Ciklum into one of the largest IT companies in Ukraine and Eastern Europe.

Mr. Majgaard brings 11 years of experience working in Eastern Europe and 20 years of IT expertise to quickly build a 700-person company in this changing market. Mr. Majgaard is also the founder and majority shareholder of Touchlink Mobile, a Danish developer of application solutions for the mobile content market. Previously, he founded and served as CEO of Vic, a hardware distributor to Eastern Europe, and Den Bla Butik, a Danish retail network for hardware sales. He is a frequent speaker in various IT related summits and conferences throughout different countries, including the Nordic IT Forum, the Central and Eastern European IT Outsourcing Summit, ETRE, ect.
